column4: can someone help me. I am running ubuntu 12.10 on my system and i want the default boot up to be tty1 instead of tty7. So i do want the gui running in the background, i just want it to boot to the virtual console first. Thanks!
no i already tried that i want the gui to be running but not in the background. i want tty1 the first i see and i want to switch to tty7 when needed
